Name: M1: A Death in the Desert
About the game: When M wakes up in an abandoned hotel he has no memory of how he got there. In the bedside draw he finds a list with three names and a gun with three bullets, but what he does with this information is up to you. Embark on a violence-soaked post-apocalyptic adventure where the answers to your questions come at a price. How far will you go to discover the truth? Features An engaging visual novel with deep moral choices A labyrinth of branching pathways that culminate in one of five distinct endings Two and a half thousand lines of dialogue told across fifteen locations. A full playthrough takes approximately 3â€“4 hours depending on reading speed.
